title: IBCLC, Midwife, RN
bio: Rebecca is a highly experienced International Board Certified Lactation Consultant (IBCLC), Registered Midwife and Registered Nurse. With over 10 years in women's health, she specializes in lactation support, antenatal education, and postnatal care.
personalStory: My journey into midwifery and lactation consulting began with my own challenging breastfeeding experience. I discovered my passion for supporting families through their feeding journey and have since dedicated my career to ensuring every family gets the support they need.

credentials.title: International Board Certified Lactation Consultant
credentials.issuingBody: International Board of Lactation Consultant Examiners

approach: I believe in evidence-based care that honors each family's unique journey. My approach combines clinical expertise with compassionate support, ensuring families feel empowered and confident in their feeding choices.

title: Lead Gymnastics Coach & Program Director
bio: Emily is a passionate gymnastics coach with over 8 years of experience working with children aged 0-12. She specializes in creating safe, nurturing environments where children can develop confidence, strength, and a love of movement through gymnastics, ninja warrior, and parkour activities.
personalStory: Growing up as a competitive gymnast, I discovered my love for coaching when I started helping younger athletes at my gym. There's nothing more rewarding than seeing a child's face light up when they master a new skill or overcome a fear. At Active8Kids, I focus on making every child feel valued and capable, regardless of their ability level.

credentials.title: Certificate IV in Sport and Recreation

approach: My coaching philosophy centers on creating a positive, inclusive environment where every child feels supported to reach their potential. I believe in celebrating small victories, encouraging effort over perfection, and making movement fun. Safety is always my top priority, and I work closely with parents to ensure each child's individual needs are met.

title: Obstetrician & Fertility Specialist
bio: Dr. Tucker is a highly regarded obstetrician and fertility specialist with over 15 years of experience. He holds the prestigious FRANZCOG qualification and is certified in reproductive endocrinology and infertility. Dr. Tucker is passionate about providing comprehensive care for couples on their fertility journey.
personalStory: Having witnessed the joy that comes with helping families achieve their dreams of parenthood, I am committed to providing compassionate, evidence-based care. Every patient's journey is unique, and I strive to offer personalized treatment plans that respect individual values and circumstances.

credentials.title: Fellowship in Obstetrics and Gynaecology
credentials.issuingBody: Royal Australian and New Zealand College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists

credentials.title: Certificate in Reproductive Endocrinology and Infertility
credentials.issuingBody: Royal Australian and New Zealand College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists

approach: I believe in a holistic approach to fertility and pregnancy care that addresses not just the medical aspects, but also the emotional and psychological needs of my patients. Communication is key, and I ensure that couples understand their options and feel supported throughout their journey.

title: Advanced Sports Dietitian, APD
bio: Peta is an Advanced Sports Dietitian and Accredited Practicing Dietitian with 18 years of experience in performance nutrition. She has worked with elite athletes across rugby league, rugby sevens, and Olympic sports, providing evidence-based nutrition strategies for optimal performance and recovery.
personalStory: My passion for sports nutrition began during my own athletic career. I understand the demands of high-performance sport and the crucial role that nutrition plays in achieving goals. Whether working with elite athletes or helping families make healthier choices, I believe in practical, sustainable nutrition that fits real life.
approach: I believe in evidence-based nutrition that is practical and sustainable. My approach combines cutting-edge sports science with real-world application, ensuring that nutrition strategies are not only effective but also achievable within the demands of training, competition, and daily life.

title: Headmistress
bio: Catherine Ryan is the dedicated Headmistress of Bronte Public School, with over 15 years of experience in educational leadership. She is passionate about fostering academic excellence and personal growth in every student.
personalStory: My career in education began as a primary school teacher, and I've been privileged to watch countless students discover their potential. As Headmistress, I'm committed to creating an environment where every child feels valued and inspired to achieve their best.
approach: I believe in nurturing the whole child - academically, socially, and emotionally. Our school is a community where students, parents, and teachers work together to create positive learning experiences.
